trans-unit.source: Specifies the visual state of a toolbar item that is drawn with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: Specifica lo stato di visualizzazione di un elemento della barra degli strumenti disegnato con stili di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ToolBarState> values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.Button>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.DropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButtonDropDown> classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ToolBarState> valori corrispondono agli Stati del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> oggetti esposti dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.Button>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.DropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButtonDropDown> classi.

trans-unit.source: The item is in the checked state.
The item is in the disabled state.
The item is in the hot state.
The item is in the hot and checked states.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento è negli stati attivo e selezionato.

trans-unit.source: The item is in the normal state.
The item is in the pressed state.
